bwg.utilities module¶

Module contents¶

Utilities for the NLP pipeline.

bwg.utilities.deserialize_line(line, encoding='utf-8')¶

Transform a line in a file that was created as a result from a Luigi task into its metadata and main data.

Parameters:
  • line (str) – Line to be serialized.
  • encoding (str) – Encoding of line (default is utf-8).
bwg.utilities.get_nes_from_sentence(sentence_data, default_ne_tag, include_tag=False)¶

Extract all named entities from a named entity tagged sentence.

Parameters:
  • sentence_data (list) – Tagged sentence data.
  • default_ne_tag (str) – Default Named Entity tag for words that are not Named Entities.
  • include_tag (bool) – Flag to indicate whether the Named entity tag should be included.
Returns:

Extracted Named Entities.
Return type:

list
bwg.utilities.just_dump(json_object, pretty=False)¶

Self-documenting?

Parameters:
  • json_object (dict) – Serialized JSON object
  • pretty (bool) – Prettify the JSON object.
Returns:

Dumped JSON object.
Return type:

str
bwg.utilities.retry_with_fallback(triggering_error, **fallback_kwargs)¶

Rerun a function in case a specific error occurs with new arguments.

Parameters:
  • triggering_error (Exception) – Error class that triggers the decorator to re-run the function.
  • fallback_kwargs (dict) – Fallback named arguments that are applied when the function is re-run.
Returns:

Decorator.
Return type:

func
bwg.utilities.serialize_article(article_id, article_url, article_title, sentences, state='raw', from_scratch=True, pretty=False, dump=True)¶

Serialize a Wikipedia article.

Parameters:
  • article_id (int) – ID of current article.
  • article_url (str) – URL of current article.
  • article_title (str) – Title of current article.
  • sentences (list, dict) – Sentences of current article.
  • state – State that describes the kind of processing that is applied to the data in this step. It’s

included in the metadata of each sentence. :type state: str :param from_scratch: Flag to indicate whether sentences IDs and metadata should be created from scratch. :type from_scratch: bool :param pretty: Flag to indicate whether the output should be pretty-printed. :type pretty: bool :param dump: Flag to indicate whether the serialized data should already be dumped. :type dump: bool :return: Serialized (and maybe dumped) data. :rtype: str, dict

bwg.utilities.serialize_dependency_parse_tree(sentence_id, parse_trees, state='raw', pretty=False, dump=True)¶

Serialize a dependency parse tree for a sentence.

Parameters:
  • sentence_id (int) – ID of current sentence.
  • parse_trees (dict, None) – Parse trees for this sentence.
  • state – State that describes the kind of processing that is applied to the data in this step. It’s

included in the metadata of each sentence. :type state: str :param pretty: Flag to indicate whether the output should be pretty-printed. :type pretty: bool :param dump: Flag to indicate whether the serialized data should already be dumped. :type dump: bool :return: Serialized (and maybe dumped) data. :rtype: str, dict

bwg.utilities.serialize_relation(sentence_id, sentence, relations, state='raw', infix='', pretty=False, dump=True)¶

Serialize an extracted relation.

Parameters:
  • sentence_id (int) – ID of current sentence.
  • sentence (str) – Sentence.
  • relations (list) – Extracted relations.
  • infix (str) – Infix for relation ID.
  • state – State that describes the kind of processing that is applied to the data in this step. It’s

included in the metadata of each sentence. :type state: str :param pretty: Flag to indicate whether the output should be pretty-printed. :type pretty: bool :param dump: Flag to indicate whether the serialized data should already be dumped. :type dump: bool :return: Serialized (and maybe dumped) data. :rtype: str, dict

bwg.utilities.serialize_tagged_sentence(sentence_id, tagged_sentence, state='raw', pretty=False, dump=True)¶

Serialize a sentence tagged with Named entity tags s.t. it can be passed between Luigi tasks.

Parameters:
  • sentence_id (int) – ID of current sentence.
  • tagged_sentence (list) – Tagged sentence.
  • state – State that describes the kind of processing that is applied to the data in this step. It’s

included in the metadata of each sentence. :type state: str :param pretty: Flag to indicate whether the output should be pretty-printed. :type pretty: bool :param dump: Flag to indicate whether the serialized data should already be dumped. :type dump: bool :return: Serialized (and maybe dumped) data. :rtype: str, dict

bwg.utilities.serialize_wikidata_entity(sentence_id, wikidata_entities, infix='', state='raw', pretty=False, dump=True)¶

Serialize relevant information of a Wikidata entity.

Parameters:
  • sentence_id (int) – ID of current sentence.
  • wikidata_entities (list) – List of Wikidata entities in a certain sentence.
  • infix (str) – Infix for Wikidata entity ID.
  • state – State that describes the kind of processing that is applied to the data in this step. It’s

included in the metadata of each sentence. :type state: str :param pretty: Flag to indicate whether the output should be pretty-printed. :type pretty: bool :param dump: Flag to indicate whether the serialized data should already be dumped. :type dump: bool :return: Serialized (and maybe dumped) data. :rtype: str, dict
